title: Build generate_page_json.js script to create JSON twins from HTML
description: Parse HTML metadata → generate .json twins. Extract SEO_INTENT data (keyword, audience, last_reviewed). Validate title (50-60 chars), meta description (140-160 chars), H1 presence. MUST generate BOTH /path.json AND /es/path.json. Each includes language, alternateLanguage, path_en, path_es, seoIntent metadata.

title: Create Program Detail page template with JSON twin structure
description: Program detail template: SEO_INTENT block with program name as keyword, optimized title/meta, single H1, 150-word intro, bilingual structured data (*_en/*_es), unstructured JSON (programNotes), FAQ section, EducationalOrganization + FAQPage schema, descriptive alt text for images.

title: Build Insights article template (structured header, abstract, references)
description: Insights article: SEO_INTENT block with research topic as keyword, optimized title/meta (50-60/140-160 chars), single H1, 150-word intro, logical heading hierarchy (H2→H3→H4), descriptive internal links, structured header/abstract/references, FAQ section, Article schema, responsive typography, lazy images, bilingual.

title: Build Help/Q&A page template (short answer above fold, Chat badge)
description: Q&A template: SEO_INTENT block with question as keyword, optimized title/meta, single H1 (the question), SHORT ANSWER above fold (150 words), detailed explanation below, descriptive links, FAQPage schema (question as mainEntity), bilingual, Chat badge 44px, lightweight HTML <50KB.

title: Implement localization infrastructure (hreflang, lang attributes, path metadata)
description: Localization infrastructure: hreflang helpers, lang attribute enforcement, path_en/path_es metadata system, slug translation utilities. Foundation for treating Spanish as first-class citizen.

title: Create language dictionaries (en.ts, es.ts) for React components
description: Create en.ts and es.ts dictionaries for React components. Export t() function for translation lookups. NO hardcoded English strings in components. Supports separate language builds.

title: Build Explorer React app (/explorer and /es/explorador)
description: Explorer: Separate entrypoints (/explorer, /es/explorador). Lazy-load Map/Charts. Mobile-first tabs (large touch targets). Language-specific dictionaries/data. No runtime translation. Initial bundle <250KB. Mobile performance critical for credibility.

title: Implement Explorer Map tab with program geography visualization
description: Explorer Map tab with lazy-loaded geography visualization. React.lazy() import. Suspense boundary. Mobile-optimized map controls (large tap targets). Only loads when tab clicked.

title: Implement Explorer Compare tab for side-by-side program comparison
description: Explorer Compare tab: Mobile-first side-by-side (stacked on mobile, side-by-side on tablet+). Large touch targets. Lazy-loaded. Responsive typography. Bilingual structured data (*_en/*_es fields).

title: Implement Explorer Match/Chat tab for guided discovery
description: Explorer Match/Chat tab: Mobile-optimized chat interface. Large input fields, generous spacing. On-demand .json fetching. Language-aware. Touch-optimized interaction. Guided discovery flow optimized for small screens.

title: Add lazy loading to Explorer for maps, charts, and heavy components
description: React.lazy() for Explorer Map tab (heavy component). Lazy-load charts, data visualizations. Only fetch when user interacts. Suspense fallbacks. Keep initial bundle light for mobile networks.

title: Build build_categories.js script for auto-generating category index pages
description: Auto-generate category index pages: SEO_INTENT block with category name as keyword, optimized title/meta, single H1, 150-word category intro, list all articles/Q&A with abstracts, descriptive link anchors, bilingual (/insights/categories/ and /es/insights/categorias/), CollectionPage schema, generate JSON twins.

title: Build Help Chat React component consuming JSON twins
description: Help Chat: Fetches .json twins on-demand (after user interaction). Language-aware (BOTH /help/*.json and /es/ayuda/*.json). Uses t() for UI. Large touch targets for chat interface. Mobile-first interaction design.

title: Build Contact Form with TanStack Form (bilingual validation, mobile-first)
description: TanStack Form with mobile-first styling: Large inputs (min 44px height), generous spacing, clear focus states, t() for all strings. Separate builds for /contact and /es/contacto. Touch-optimized validation feedback.

title: Create serverless endpoint for Contact Form submissions
Create mobile-first-audit Claude Skill in /.claude/skills/
description: Mobile-first-audit Skill: Scan CSS for max-width queries (desktop-first flag). Verify touch targets ≥44x44px. Check viewport meta tag. Test on 320px, 375px, 768px, 1024px+. Flag horizontal scroll. Enforce Lighthouse mobile >90.

title: Create localization-check Claude Skill
description: Claude Skill that walks /public/ and /public/es/, verifies path_en/path_es metadata, checks hreflang bidirectionality, audits *_es fields in structured data, reports missing Spanish mappings.

title: Create page-json-sync Claude Skill
Create build-category-pages Claude Skill
Create accessibility-scan Claude Skill
Create performance-budget Claude Skill
Create data-governance-scan Claude Skill
Build generate_sitemap.js script for sitemap.xml generation
description: Generate sitemap.xml from all published pages. Include both /... and /es/... URLs. Set <lastmod> from LAST_REVIEWED in SEO_INTENT block. Priority based on page type (programs=0.8, insights=0.7, help=0.6). Validate against sitemap schema.

title: Configure Vite build for React islands with bundle size limits (~250KB)
description: Vite config: Separate entry points for each React island (Explorer, Chat, Contact Form). Bundle size limit 250KB. Code splitting. Tree shaking. Prevent loading unnecessary JS on static pages. Mobile performance = priority.

title: Create .htaccess for SiteGround (compression, caching, canonical redirects)
Create sitemap.xml, robots.txt, manifest.webmanifest, humans.txt
description: Create sitemap.xml (from script), robots.txt (allow all, sitemap URL), manifest.webmanifest (PWA metadata, lang_en/lang_es), humans.txt (team credits). All support bilingual site structure. robots.txt points to both sitemaps if separate.

title: Implement mobile-first responsive CSS with printer-friendly styles
description: Global CSS (/assets/css/main.css): Single-column mobile base (320px+). Progressive enhancement via min-width only. Touch targets ≥44px. Fluid typography (rem + clamp). No horizontal scroll. Printer-friendly. Academic credibility through mobile clarity.

title: Seed initial program data (structured TypeScript objects)
description: Seed program data with bilingual TypeScript interfaces: focusAreas_en/focusAreas_es, methodsCulture_en/methodsCulture_es. Shared numeric/boolean data. No English-only fields for descriptive content.

title: Seed initial faculty data with advisor availability status
Create initial unstructured program notes (English and Spanish)
Write initial Insights articles with JSON twin generation
description: Write initial Insights articles: Include SEO_INTENT block, research topic as primary keyword, optimized title/meta, single H1, 150-word intro, logical heading hierarchy, descriptive internal links, FAQ section, Article schema, citations with back-links, bilingual, generate JSON twins for both languages.

title: Write initial Help/Q&A pages with lastReviewed and disclaimers
description: Write initial Help/Q&A pages: SEO_INTENT block with question as keyword, optimized title/meta, H1 = question, SHORT ANSWER (150 words) above fold, detailed explanation, FAQPage schema, lastReviewed + disclaimers in BOTH languages, descriptive links, bilingual, generate JSON twins.

title: Run full validation suite (all Claude Skills + build scripts)
Build validate_localization.js script to enforce / ↔ /es/ parity
description: Enforce / ↔ /es/ parity. Verify every page has path_en/path_es metadata. Check hreflang bidirectionality. Audit that *_es fields exist in structured data. Report missing Spanish counterparts.

title: Verify Lighthouse scores >90 on mobile for all page types
Test bilingual navigation and hreflang implementation
Deploy to SiteGround production environment
Verify all URLs, JSON twins, and interactive components in production
Document mobile-first design principles and breakpoint strategy
description: Document mobile-first design principles: single-column base layout, min-width media queries only, 44x44px touch targets, performance = credibility. Define breakpoints: 320px (base), 768px (tablet), 1024px+ (desktop).

title: Document localization-first principles (Spanish as first-class citizen)
Implement URL mirroring structure (/ and /es/ with translated slugs)
Create slug translation mapping system (en → es URL conversion)
Enforce path_en/path_es metadata in all HTML and JSON twins
Implement mandatory lang attribute and hreflang links in all pages
Build accessibility-scan.js script for WCAG AA validation
description: WCAG AA validation + SEO accessibility: Heading hierarchy (H1→H2→H3, no skipping), alt text for all meaningful images, descriptive link anchors (no 'click here'), semantic HTML (<main>, <article>, <section>), lang attributes, contrast ratios, focus indicators.

title: Add visible language switcher to all page templates (Español/English)
Build bilingual React entrypoint system (/explorer vs /es/explorador)
Implement translation dictionary system (t() function, no hardcoded strings)
Create TypeScript interfaces for bilingual structured data (*_en, *_es fields)
Implement dual unstructured data system (*.en.json vs *.es.json)
Create per-language JSON twin generation (both /...json and /es/...json)
Implement inline language tagging utility (<span lang='es/en'>)
Enforce lastReviewed and disclaimers in BOTH languages for sensitive content
Update localization-check Skill to audit *_es fields in structured data
Add alternateLanguage verification to validate_localization.js
Build data-governance-scan.js script to enforce disclaimers and lastReviewed
description: Verify lastReviewed + disclaimers on visa/AI/integrity content IN BOTH LANGUAGES. Check both /...json and /es/...json twins. No English-only governance.

title: Implement single-column mobile-first CSS with progressive enhancement (min-width only)
Enforce 44x44px minimum touch targets for all interactive elements
Create mobile-first CSS Grid/Flexbox patterns (single-col → multi-col)
Implement mobile-first TanStack Form styling (large inputs, spacing)
Configure Vite separate entry points for React islands (zero unnecessary JS)
Implement lazy loading for images (loading='lazy' on all img tags)
Implement React.lazy() for heavy Explorer components (Map, Charts)
Implement on-demand JSON fetching (Chat only fetches .json after interaction)
Enforce lightweight initial HTML payload (<50KB uncompressed)
Implement responsive typography (rem units, clamp() for headings)
Create performance-audit.sh and lighthouse_ci.sh for Core Web Vitals
description: Lighthouse CI: Enforce mobile score >90 as pre-deployment gate. Core Web Vitals audit. Performance budget checks. Run against preview builds. Block deployment if score <90.

title: Enforce optimal line length on tablets (max-width on text containers)
Implement above-the-fold content prioritization (Q&A short answers)
Build CSS audit tool to detect max-width media queries (desktop-first red flag)
Configure Lighthouse CI to enforce mobile score >90 in pre-deployment
Build touch target size validator (scan for elements <44x44px)
Implement SEO_INTENT comment block in all page templates (keyword, audience, last_reviewed)
Enforce 50-60 char titles with primary keyword in all pages
Enforce 140-160 char meta descriptions with keyword variant in all pages
Implement canonical URLs with hreflang cross-linking for all bilingual pages
Enforce single H1 with primary keyword per page
Create HTML templates for semantic, WCAG AA accessible base pages
description: Base HTML template: SEO_INTENT block, 50-60 char title with keyword, 140-160 char meta description, canonical + hreflang, single H1, <html lang='en|es'>, semantic HTML5, mobile viewport, WCAG AA, visible language switcher, path_en/path_es metadata.

title: Implement logical heading hierarchy validator (H2→H3→H4, no skipping)
Enforce 150-word intro paragraph explaining page purpose on all pages
Implement descriptive internal linking (no 'click here' anchors)
Add FAQ section to all program and help pages (Q&A format)
Implement FAQPage JSON-LD schema for all pages with Q&A content
Implement EducationalOrganization schema for program pages
Enforce descriptive alt text for all meaningful images (both languages)
Build SEO audit tool to validate SEO_INTENT blocks across all pages
Build meta tag validator (title length, description length, uniqueness)
Build structured data validator (schema.org compliance check)
Build Program List pages (pure link lists, zero commentary, Related Resources)
description: Program list pages: SEO_INTENT block, optimized title/meta, single H1 with keyword, 150-word intro paragraph, pure link lists (RULE 1), descriptive link anchors, large touch targets, bilingual, FAQ section at bottom, Related Resources, FAQPage schema.

title: Create SEO compliance Claude Skill (runs all SEO audits pre-commit)
Implement keyword stuffing detector (flag unnatural keyword density)
Build duplicate content detector (flag identical meta tags across pages)
